ctsb.problems package¶

core¶

This is a core

Problem()

custom¶

ctsb.problems.CustomProblem() Description: class for implementing algorithms with enforced modularity
ctsb.problems.register_custom_problem(…) Description: global custom problem method

ctsb.problems.ControlProblem() Description: class for online control tests
ctsb.problems.control.LDS() Description: Simulates a linear dynamical system.
ctsb.problems.control.LSTM_Output() Description: Produces outputs from a randomly initialized recurrent neural network.
ctsb.problems.control.RNN_Output() Description: Produces outputs from a randomly initialized recurrent neural network.

time_series¶

ctsb.problems.TimeSeriesProblem() Description: class for online control tests
ctsb.problems.time_series.SP500() Description: Outputs the daily opening price of the S&P 500 stock market index from January 3, 1986 to June 29, 2018.
ctsb.problems.time_series.UCI_Indoor() Description: Outputs various weather metrics from a UCI dataset from 13/3/2012 to 11/4/2012
ctsb.problems.time_series.ENSO() Description: Collection of monthly values of control indices useful for predicting La Nina/El Nino.
ctsb.problems.time_series.Crypto() Description: Outputs the daily price of bitcoin from 2013-04-28 to 2018-02-10
ctsb.problems.time_series.Random() Description: A random sequence of scalar values taken from an i.i.d.
ctsb.problems.time_series.ARMA() Description: Simulates an autoregressive moving-average time-series.
ctsb.problems.time_series.Unemployment() Description: Outputs the daily price of bitcoin from 2013-04-28 to 2018-02-10
